content.en: Spatial healthcare accessibility: Researchers have been using algorithms to assess the accessibility of healthcare services in various regions. They have developed models that incorporate factors like distance, transportation modes, and competition between facilities to accurately measure spatial access to government health services in Kenya. These algorithms are also being used to improve the spatial planning of public health services and assign responsibility for hospital performance and healthcare costs. Additionally, algorithms are being used to analyze road accessibility to public hospitals in different areas, such as Mallorca, Spain.
content.da: Rumlig sundhedstilgængelighed: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at vurdere tilgængeligheden af sundhedsydelser i forskellige regioner. De har udviklet modeller, der inkorporerer faktorer som afstand, transportmidler og konkurrence mellem faciliteter for præcist at måle rumlig adgang til offentlige sundhedsydelser i Kenya. Disse algoritmer bliver også brugt til at forbedre den rumlige planlægning af offentlige sundhedstjenester og tildele ansvar for hospitalspræstationer og sundhedsomkostninger. Desuden bruges algoritmer til at analysere vejadgangen til offentlige hospitaler i forskellige områder, såsom Mallorca, Spanien.
